name: bhs-science-resource-center
description: BHS science resource center website to help students contact alumni and various other things

scripts.build-test: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] test/spec/frontendSpec.js | uglifyjs > test/spec/specBundle.js
scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] frontend/js/main.js -o frontend/dist/bundle.js
scripts.init: npm install && npm run build && npm run build-test

author: Into.CS
